# experience

**Instance Property**

The current experience.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var experience: AVExperienceController.Experience { get }
```

## Discussion

The system updates this value only after the [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/TransitionContext/status-swift.property] changes to [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/TransitionContext/Status-swift.enum/finished(result:)].

Implement the [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/Delegate-swift.protocol/experienceController(_:didChangeTransitionContext:)] delegate method to observe changes to this value.

## Configuring the experience

- **allowedExperiences**: The set of experiences the application supports.
- **availableExperiences**: The allowed experiences that are available to use on the device at this time.
- **AVExperienceController.Experiences**: A structure that represents a collection of experiences to use with an experience controller.
- **AVExperienceController.Experience**: The types of experiences the system supports.
- **configuration**: The configuration options per experience.
- **AVExperienceController.Configuration**: A structure that stores per-experience configuration.
